scripts.prepare: pnpm run install-core-dependencies && pnpm run install-dev-dependencies
scripts.install-core-dependencies: pnpm add express cors helmet morgan dotenv typeorm reflect-metadata pg class-validator class-transformer bcrypt jsonwebtoken cli-table3 chalk winston ioredis mysql2
scripts.install-dev-dependencies: pnpm add -D typescript ts-node ts-node-dev @types/node @types/express @types/cors @types/morgan @types/bcrypt @types/jsonwebtoken tsc-alias tsconfig-paths nodemon
